title: Typophile problems?
content: Is is only me, or has Typophile been down all weekend?
author: Goran Soderstrom

comments.content:
This error message was shown on the homepage: Warning: mysql_connect(): Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/tmp/mysql.sock2' (2) in /home/httpd/vhosts/typophile.com/httpdocs/cms/includes/database.mysql.inc on line 31
Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/tmp/mysql.sock2' (2)
I couldn't access either : (
Me too. Quite disconcerting — like the off license being closed ; )

And it's been happening way too often.

hhp
Well, I wasn't too worried about it. Gave me an excellent reason to spend my weekend out of the home.
Punchcutters - I know you are all far too busy to deal with these bugs over a weekend. If the fix is simple, how about delegating to a responsible admin?

I think it is necessary to be off once in a while to feel the love and the lovemaking when you comeback!  
Welcome with open arms and legs?!  
Absence makes wonders!

The issue is one of disk space and pruning back content is a manual and sometimes tedious task. We've addressed the issue with Media Temple and have requested more disk space on the server. Thanks for your patience, and sorry for the inconvenience.
:( I thought they gave us more space already? Must we start a campaign to raise some funds for more space?

With respect to the wonderful resources donated by the current hosts, is there anything users can do to avoid this problem? Like others I'd image, I can donate server resources.

Disk space is not expensive, and shouldn't be an issues these days.

Here's an update for anyone interested in the gory details. First of all, apologies for the recent outages.

In order to enable a database cache, we upgraded MySQL to version 4.1x. At the same time, we added an autostart script. What I neglected to do was to name the said script starting with a capital S (RedHat likes it that way).

In the mean time, our server is being relocated to a really sweet data center, so for the last few weekends the nice folks at Media Temple have restarted the server a couple of times. Since the startup script was failing, MySQL didn't come back online with the rest of the server like it's supposed to. The problem has been fixed, and hopefully we won't have any more sad Typophile-less weekends.

The disk space issue has been solved and isn't an issue.

\> The problem has been fixed, and hopefully we won’t have any more sad Typophile-less weekends...The disk space issue has been solved and isn’t an issue.

"Sadly, the 2 problems have been been fixed, I will have more and more Sad weekends" my spouse has said.
Ok, minor blip this morning. It's been fixed for real. :-/
